item.description:
Hello all winter hikers! :)
We'll do a 1 to 1.5 hour loop in the Goodwin or Natchaug Forest. Please plan to meet up at my house before the hike to avoid dealing with waiting outside if it's very cold, although we'll leave promptly for the trail head at 1.00. Be on time if you want to join. Wear good hiking boots (it will probably be muddy/snowy/icy in parts) and bring water. Afterwards I will offer drinks and snacks. If it is snowing or raining hard we will reschedule. :D We tend to hike at a fairly brisk pace, but the trail is not at all technically difficult and is pretty flat.
Call on 860-465-9044 if you have questions about the weather.
-V.

group.name: The NorthEast Connecticut Friends Meetup Group

item.name: Deep Winter Hike
